definitions.definition: Loosely associated ; of limited relevance except indirectly ; only accidentally related.
examples: That character, though colorful, is incidental to the overall plot.

definitions.definition: Existing tangentially , being a byproduct , a tangent , or a likely consequence .
examples: Injuries are incidental to contact sports: they're going to happen.

definitions.definition: Entering or approaching , prior to reflection (more frequently incident ).

main_definition: Loosely associated ; of limited relevance except indirectly ; only accidentally related.
secondary_definitions: Existing tangentially , being a byproduct , a tangent , or a likely consequence .
( physics , of radiation ) Entering or approaching , prior to reflection (more frequently incident ).
